name: Medplum
headline: API first electronic health record (EHR) that is open source
description: Medplum makes it easy to build healthcare webapps that are compliant and interoperability ready.  Our open source toolkit allows healthcare providers write apps that are HIPAA compliant, SOC2 certified and FHIR native - streamlining payor connections, health system integrations and more.

founders.name: Reshma Khilnani, Founder
founders.description: Reshma is CEO of Medplum. In the recent past she was a Visiting Group Partner at YC. Reshma Khilnani was co-founded of MedXT (YC W13 acquired by Box) and Droplet (now Kit.com). Early in her career she held roles at Facebook and Microsoft. Reshma has a BS and MEng from MIT in EECS. She lives in San Francisco and owns reshma.com

founders.name: Rahul Agarwal, Founder
founders.description: Rahul is COO at Medplum. In the past, he worked on the machine learning team at Palantir, and was the Customer Impact Lead at Applied Intuition. Rahul has a B.S. and M.S. in Computer Science from Stanford, and an MBA from MIT Sloan

founders.name: Cody Ebberson, Founder
founders.description: Cody is CTO of Medplum, an open source healthcare data platform.  In the past, he was a Director of Engineering at One Medical, Healthcare Engineering Lead at Box, and co-founded MedXT (YC W13 acquired by Box).  Cody holds a BS in Computer Science and an MBA from Harvard Business School.

raw_markdown="[Skip to main content](https://www.medplum.com/<#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback>)
[![Medplum Logo](https://www.medplum.com/img/logo.svg)**Medplum**](https://www.medplum.com/</>)[Products](https://www.medplum.com/</products>)[Solutions](https://www.medplum.com/</solutions>)[Documentation](https://www.medplum.com/</docs>)[Reference](https://www.medplum.com/</docs/api>)
[Sign In](https://www.medplum.com/<https:/app.medplum.com/>)[GitHub](https://www.medplum.com/<https:/github.com/medplum/medplum>)
Search`K`
# Fast and easyhealthcare dev
Medplum is the open source healthcare developer platform that helps you build, test, and deliver any healthcare product or service.
[Get Started![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/btn-arrow.svg)](https://www.medplum.com/</docs>)
![Robot working in a medical office](https://www.medplum.com/img/illustration-header.svg)
0k
### Dev hours saved annually
No more choosing between prepackaged EHRs or spending thousands of dev hours on homegrown solutions. Medplum moves the starting line so you can get to the unique features of your app, stat.
### Infinitely programmable, forever
Medplum enables any application, any automation, any integration you can imagine, and lets you seamlessly operate in the wider healthcare ecosystem of today, tomorrow, and every day after.
0
### Elite healthcare dev contributors
Our robust universe of documentation, community, and support keeps you in the company of today's best healthcare developers.
## Get started, fast
```
$ npm init medplum
```

## Focus on building apps, not infra
The future-ready, medical-grade backend that tames the complexity of healthcare development.
![API-first](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/api.svg)
### API-first
Integrate with any partner, anywhere, in any way with data share options in a variety of formats.
![FHIR-native](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/code.svg)
### FHIR-native
Anticipate nuances and avoid costly re-writes down the line with default FHIR-standard formatted data storage.
![Automation](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/automation.svg)
### Automation
Streamline your operations and automate any workflow to activate, track, manage, and measure tasks of any level of complexity.
![Open source](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/locker.svg)
### Open source
Medplum's core technology is open source (Apache 2.0 license) and freely available in GitHub, so there’s never a risk of vendor lock-in.
![Secure & Compliant](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/shield.svg)
### Secure & Compliant
Comes with HIPAA and SOC2 compliance out of the box, follows all OWASP security guidelines, and is verified by multiple penetration tests.
![Scalable](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/scalable.svg)
### Scalable
From MVP to IPO - and every major milestone in between - Medplum’s technology backs you up and grows with you.
## Trusted by
![Kit](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/kit.webp)![Miga Health](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/miga.webp)![Ro](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/ro.webp)![Human First](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/human-first.webp)![CDC](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/cdc.webp)![Thirty Madison](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/thirty-madison.webp)![Summer Health](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/summer-health.webp)![Alley Corp](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/alley-corp.webp)![Helpful](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/helpful.webp)![Flexpa](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/flexpa.webp)![Imagine](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/imagine.webp)![Tia](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/tia.webp)![Kit](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/kit.webp)![Miga Health](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/miga.webp)![Ro](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/ro.webp)![Human First](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/human-first.webp)![CDC](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/cdc.webp)![Thirty Madison](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/thirty-madison.webp)![Summer Health](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/summer-health.webp)![Alley Corp](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/alley-corp.webp)![Helpful](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/helpful.webp)![Flexpa](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/flexpa.webp)![Imagine](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/imagine.webp)![Tia](https://www.medplum.com/img/logos/tia.webp)
## Solutions
### Custom EHR
Save hundreds of hours of dev time with our headless EHR.
[Learn more![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Learn more about Medplum Custom EHR](https://www.medplum.com/</solutions/custom-ehr>)
### Patient Portal
Accelerate customizable, scalable patient-facing experiences.
[Learn more![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Learn more about Medplum Patient Portal](https://www.medplum.com/</solutions/patient-portal>)
### Provider Portal
Accelerate customizable, scalable provider-facing experiences.
[Learn more![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Learn more about Medplum Provider Portal](https://www.medplum.com/</solutions/provider-portal>)
### Infrastructure you can trust to meet any future you make.
Infrastructure you can trust to meet whatever future you make. Medplum fast-paths your team to the innovation stage, increasing your developer velocity to let you get to market faster with a secure, compliant, and scalable foundation. It’s clean, customizable technology that simply works - from MVP to IPO.
[Book a demo![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/btn-arrow.svg)](https://www.medplum.com/<https:/cal.com/medplum/demo>)
![Robot working in a medical office](https://www.medplum.com/img/infrastructure-jumbotron.svg)
## You can't build for tomorrowon yesterday's tech.
Medplum is built by and for exceptional engineers at the forefront of digital healthcare. Our vision is to accelerate the development of new healthcare products and services by clearing a path for every developer who wants to build in the healthcare ecosystem.
### Ready to get started?
Explore our Docs or create an account to start building now. 
[Get started![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Learn more about Medplum](https://www.medplum.com/</docs>)
### Plans and pricing
A plan for every project with no hidden fees and an always-free tier.
[Pricing![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Go to Medplum Pricing page](https://www.medplum.com/</pricing>)
### Not a developer?
Let’s talk about how Medplum can help your dev team ship faster.
Email us![Go arrow](https://www.medplum.com/img/arrow-small-btn.svg)Learn more about FHIR Basics
## User Testimonials
Join thousands of developers across the world who use Medplum.
![Michael Caves](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/michael-caves.webp)
Michael Caves
Dir of Product, Thirty Madison
Thanks to the expertise of the Medplum team, we were able to swiftly implement their product and get it up and running seamlessly. Their proactive approach in anticipating and mitigating any issues during our ramp-up was an example of first rate partnership. With their robust product, we've gained the agility to rapidly introduce new features, enabling Thirty Madison to maintain its commitment to putting patients first.
![Florencia Herra Vega](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/florencia.webp)
Florencia Herra Vega
CEO at AlleyCorp Nord
We have been dreaming of a product that simplifies building custom EHRs and clinical tools for years. Medplum achieves this with an expert team, a fantastic developer experience, and standards compliance.
![Jose Rodriguez](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/jose-rodrigues.webp)
Jose Rodriguez
Head of Engineering Summer Health
If you don’t want to reinvent everything, and want standards compliant data and well documented interfaces, Medplum is what you would choose.
![Craig Collier](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/craig-collier.webp)
Craig Collier
Senior Software Engineer, Ro
The Medplum GUI is very nice. There’s a lot of depth there.
![Hassy Veldstra](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/hassy.webp)
Hassy Veldstra
Artillery
Love seeing scalability & performance treated as a first-class feature. Always a sign of a project that takes quality seriously.
![Phil Fung](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/phil-fung.webp)
Phil Fung
Co-founder Kit.com, Facebook Engineer #15
[![Twitter icon](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/twitter-icon.svg)](https://www.medplum.com/<https:/twitter.com/philfung>)
Quality code base, open source and sets your data on the right path with FHIR. No-brainer for those who need to build for healthcare.
![Joshua Kelly](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/joshuakelly.png)
Joshua Kelly
CTO at Flexpa
[![Twitter icon](https://www.medplum.com/img/icons/twitter-icon.svg)](https://www.medplum.com/<https:/twitter.com/jdjkelly>)
Medplum is the best FHIR server implementation. Flexpa uses it to power our API and we wouldn't have nearly as good a product without it.
![Dima Goncharov](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/dima.webp)
Dima Goncharov
CEO Metriport
Open source will transform healthcare, and Medplum is a prime example.
![Alan G](https://www.medplum.com/img/avatars/ag.webp)
Alan G
First off I want to say this is amazing and I love the work you all are doing.
Medplum
  * [![SOC](https://www.medplum.com/img/compliance/soc.png)](https://www.medplum.com/</security>) [![HIPAA](https://www.medplum.com/img/compliance/hipaa.png)](https://www.medplum.com/</security>)

generated_description:
### Medplum: Revolutionizing Healthcare Development

Medplum is a San Francisco-based startup that launched in 2021 and quickly made waves in the healthcare tech space as part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. With a lean team of three, Medplum aims to tackle the complexities of healthcare development by providing an open-source, API-first electronic health record (EHR) platform designed specifically for developers.

#### The Core Mission
At its heart, Medplum is about making healthcare development accessible and efficient. The platform allows developers to create compliant healthcare web applications that are both HIPAA compliant and FHIR-native, facilitating seamless integrations with payors and health systems.

#### Key Features
1. **Open Source & API-First**: Medplum’s technology is built on open-source principles (Apache 2.0), allowing unlimited programmability without the fear of vendor lock-in. Developers can use the API to connect with any partner or service, accommodating diverse data sharing needs.
  
2. **Built for Compliance**: With built-in HIPAA and SOC2 compliance, Medplum radically reduces the headache typically associated with regulatory adherence in healthcare technology.

3. **Flexibility and Automation**: Medplum supports the automation of complex operations, helping developers create and manage workflows without the usual hassles and setbacks.

4. **Robust Developer Support**: The platform boasts comprehensive documentation and a vibrant community, ensuring developers are never alone in their journey.

5. **Scalability**: Whether you're launching a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) or scaling to an IPO, Medplum grows with your needs, providing a solid foundation for future development.

#### Available Solutions
- **Custom EHRs**: Medplum offers a headless EHR solution that saves substantial development time.
- **Patient and Provider Portals**: Their platform enables the rapid creation of customizable, scalable portals for both patients and healthcare providers.

#### Endorsements and Success Stories
Medplum is gaining traction and is already trusted by a roster of notable clients, including Thirty Madison, CDC, and Ro Health. Users consistently praise the platform's ease of use, developer-centric approach, and how it significantly accelerates the pace of launching new features.

#### The Bigger Picture
In a landscape where many healthcare tech solutions are clunky and outdated, Medplum emerges as a breath of fresh air. By prioritizing developer experience and providing robust, compliant solutions, Medplum isn’t just another tool; it’s a catalyst for innovation in healthcare technology.

To dive deeper into what Medplum can do for you and your development team, visit their website here: [Medplum](https://www.medplum.com).
